REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0555 reute h f BC-FARM-EQUIPMENT-RETAIL 03-12 0093

TEXT.TITLE: FARM EQUIPMENT RETAIL SALES FALL IN FEBRUARY
TEXT.BODY: Sale of farm wheel tractors in February declined 26.7 pct to 4,123 units from 5,627 units a year ago, reported the Farm and Industrial Equipment Institute. Year to date, total tractor sales fell 21.7 pct to 10,354 units from 13,231 units a year ago. The trade group said in the two-wheel drive sector, 2,477 under 40 horsepower tractors were sold compared to 2,479 a year ago during the month, while in the 40 to 100 horsepower sector, 1,323 units were sold compared to 1,810 units. Reuter
